pullRequest.title: Adjust warning for heap size bootstrap check
pullRequest.bodyText:
Today the heap size check warns the user about two issues why they might care about the heap size check: resize pauses, and if memory locking is enabled. Yet, we unconditionally make mention of the memory locking reason, even if memory locking is not enabled. This can confuse some users, so we adjust the warning about memory locking to only display if memory locking is enabled.
Closes #56422

commit.message:
Adjust warning for heap size bootstrap check

Today the heap size check warns the user about two issues why they might
care about the heap size check: resize pauses, and if memory locking is
enabled. Yet, we unconditionally make mention of the memory locking
reason, even if memory locking is not enabled. This can confuse some
users, so we adjust the warning about memory locking to only display if
memory locking is enabled.

nodes.bodyText: Shouldn't the memory locking part be in the other condition's message, since this is the not memory locked case?
